price: „Зато пожурите Аллаху, ја сам вам Његов јасни опомињач!
arabic: فَفِرُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fafirrū ilā al-lahi innī lakum min'hu nadhīrun mubīnun
